answerText: Gertrude[10] Gertrude is the name of the sister of Stephen Kumalo in this Alan Paton novel, in which Absalom kills Arthur Jarvis in a botched burglary.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | LASA A + UVA B | 12 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: 12. When asked to comment on the action of The Murder of Gonzago, this character remarks "The lady doth protest too much, methinks." For 10 points each: [10] Name this character who dies after drinking poisoned wine intended for her son. That son says "Wretched queen, adieu!" in response to her death.
